definition: to toast sb (with wine etc)/to drink a toast
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
variant of 舉|举[ju3]
variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
variant of 杯[bei1]
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: I' ll drink his health in honour of its being Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，城里人喝酒时都举杯祝她健康。

sentences.english: I look at you, and I sigh.
sentences.chinese: 我举杯唇边，看着你，轻叹。

sentences.english: I raise my cup to invite the moon, who blends Her light with my shadow and we're three friends.
sentences.chinese: 举杯向天，邀请明月，与我的影子相对，便成了三人。

sentences.english: Raise a toast to a good day.
sentences.chinese: 为一个好日子举杯祝酒。

sentences.english: The knights rose from the banquet table to pledge the king.
sentences.chinese: 众武士从宴席上起立，举杯祝国王健康。

sentences.english: NO01,2. A toast to the newlyweds.
And Cleopatra Night drinks all. 'Tis done.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜埃及女皇举杯畅饮。

sentences.english: So cheer us on through the sun and rain .
sentences.chinese: 风雨中我们共患难，期待雨后阳光下举杯同庆。

sentences.english: People sang and danced and drank.
sentences.chinese: 人们唱歌跳舞，举杯畅饮。

sentences.english: Wassail toast, simultaneous praise of Auld Lang Syne.
sentences.chinese: 举杯痛饮，同声歌颂友谊地久天长。

sentences.english: Do you still remember that we drank our fill on our parting dinner ?
sentences.chinese: 还记得分别宴会上我们的举杯畅饮吗？

sentences.english: Raise the glass to brow, viewing and admiring the color of wine.
sentences.chinese: 举杯齐眉，观赏葡萄酒的色泽。

sentences.english: No, you can't have the toaster.
Refilling the glasses in coming years won't be quite so easy.
sentences.chinese: 但未来数年要再次举杯庆祝可能就不会那么容易了。

sentences.english: When drinking to someone's health you raise your glasses but the glasses should not touch.
sentences.chinese: 当祝某人健康时要举杯但不要同别人的羽觞碰撞。

sentences.english: The chairman proposed a toast to the guests.

definition: to drink a toast/Cheers! (proposing a toast)/Here's to you!/Bottoms up!/lit. dry cup
to drink a toast
wine cup
to drain the cup in one gulp (idiom)
to toast/to propose a toast
to pour wine or liquor
to raise one's wine cup
to drink and chat merrily (idiom)
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
to not go home until drunk (idiom)/let's make a night of it!
to get thoroughly drunk (idiom)/to get plastered
to drink one's fill
to pour/to deliberate
wine goblets and gambling chips lie intertwined/to drink and gamble together in a large group (idiom)/a big (drinking) party
to respect/to venerate/to salute/to offer
dilute wine/insipid wine/I'm sorry the wine I offer you is so poor (humble)
